name: ts-tdp-sci-ux
description: Prototype of the scientist experience in Tetra Data Platform

scripts.dev: yarn setup-env && dotenvx run --overload -f .env.server -- yarn dev:no-env
scripts.build: yarn workspace @ts-design-patterns/client build && yarn workspace @ts-design-patterns/server build
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @ts-design-patterns/client lint && yarn workspace @ts-design-patterns/server lint
scripts.docker:build-for-publish: docker build . -t ts-design-patterns:latest --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=production && docker save ts-design-patterns:latest -o image.tar
